description.overview: Sensitivity represents your emotional awareness, empathy, and attunement to the feelings and energy around you.
description.detailed: This meter tracks Moon, Venus, and Neptune transits to your natal Moon, Neptune, and 12th house (the unconscious). The Moon shows emotional receptivity. Neptune dissolves boundaries for deep empathy and psychic awareness. Venus adds compassion. When these planets form supportive aspects, your sensitivity is a gift that allows profound connection and intuition. Challenging aspects make you emotionally porous in ways that feel overwhelming - you absorb others' emotions and struggle to maintain boundaries. The 12th house heightens this sensitivity to collective and unconscious feelings.

primary_planets.neptune: Dissolves emotional boundaries for empathy and psychic awareness

secondary_planets.uranus: Can create erratic emotional awareness when active

key_houses.12: The unconscious, collective feelings, psychic awareness

aspect_weights.conjunction: Maximum sensitivity - profound empathy or overwhelming absorption
aspect_weights.opposition: High impact - tension between self and other's feelings
aspect_weights.trine: High flow - sensitivity as a gift and natural intuition
aspect_weights.square: Moderate friction - boundary challenges with emotions
aspect_weights.sextile: Moderate flow - opportunities for empathic connection

interpretation_guidelines.tone: Validating and boundary-conscious - honor their sensitivity as real, not oversensitive
interpretation_guidelines.focus_when_high: Emphasize using sensitivity as intuition, trusting gut feelings, deep empathic connections
interpretation_guidelines.focus_when_low: Emphasize emotional numbness is protection, gentleness with self, not forcing feeling
interpretation_guidelines.focus_when_challenging: Validate emotional overwhelm - offer boundary strategies (limit exposure, solo time, energetic protection)

phrasing_examples.high_harmonious: Your emotional sensitivity is a gift today - trust your gut feelings and use your deep empathy to connect meaningfully.
phrasing_examples.moderate_mixed: You're picking up on a lot of emotional energy around you - honor when you need to step back and create space from others' feelings.
phrasing_examples.low_challenging: You're absorbing too much from others today and feeling flooded - protect your energy by limiting exposure and creating solo time.
